quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
author: Plutarch

quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

quote: Education is the most effective tool to change society.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: The whole of science is nothing more than a refinement of everyday thinking.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The whole art of teaching is only the art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds.
author: Anatole France

quote: In the end we will only conserve what we love, we will love only what we understand, and we will understand only what we are taught.
author: Baba Dioum

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
author: Aristotle

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
author: Mark Van Doren

quote: Children thrive when they feel they belong.
author: Brene Brown

quote: A good teacher is like a candle - it consumes itself to light the way for others.
author: Mustafa Kemal Atatürk

quote: Teaching and learning should not stand on opposite sides of a barricade.
author: Bell Hooks

quote: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Perhaps the most important thing we ever give each other is our attention.
author: Rachel Carson

quote: A child educated only at school is an uneducated child.
author: George Santayana

quote: The teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on cold iron.
author: Horace Mann

quote: Children are not things to be molded, but people to be unfolded.
author: Jess Lair

quote: The child is the father of the man.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The true test of civilization is not the census, nor the size of cities, but the kind of man the country turns out.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: A child miseducated is a child lost.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The influence of a good teacher can never be erased.
author: Henry Adams

quote: A child's creativity should never be confined to a box.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The greatest gift you can give a child is the gift of reading.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: Teaching is a calling, not just a job.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Children are naturally curious. Our job is to fuel that curiosity.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Teaching is showing the way, not telling the answer.
author: Socrates

quote: Education is the key that unlocks the door to opportunity.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: A teacher is someone who uses a book and a candle instead of dynamite.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The most powerful weapon in the world is education.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The task of the excellent teacher is to stimulate apparently ordinary people to unusual effort.
author: K. Patricia Cross

quote: A teacher's job is to take a child where they are and help them get where they need to go.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: In teaching, it is the method and not the content that is the message.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: A child who is allowed to be itself will display intelligence to astonish us.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Play is the work of childhood.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Discipline in its true sense is not something imposed against the child's will, but something he conquers for himself.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The environment is no other than the instrument through which the child develops.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The role of the teacher is not to talk, but to observe.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The teacher's work is not to show the way, but to wake the child.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The hand is the chief teacher of the brain.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: It is proven that the child absorbs knowledge faster through joy than through fear.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Real learning comes about when the competitive spirit has ceased.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The capacity for wonder is one of the greatest gifts we can have.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: What a child can do in cooperation today, he can do alone tomorrow.
author: Lev Vygotsky

quote: The human mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be ignited.
author: Aristotle

quote: To teach is to learn twice.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
author: Robert Maynard Hutchins

quote: Education is the development of the individual, not the filling of the vessel.
author: Charlotte Mason

quote: Teaching should awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most important function of education at any level is to develop the personality of the individual.
author: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats beauty and youth.
author: Chanakya

quote: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
author: Will Durant

quote: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
author: Brian Herbert

quote: Education is the silver bullet that can help achieve all of the UN Sustainable Development Goals.
author: Audrey Azoulay

quote: A good education is a foundation for a better future.
author: Elizabeth Warren

quote: Education is for improving the lives of others and for leaving your community and world better than you found it.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: I have come to believe that a great teacher is a great artist and that there are as few of them as there are great artists.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Education is the vehicle of upward social mobility.
author: James Freeman Clarke

quote: We teach kids best not by talking at them, but by engaging their innate curiosity.
author: Sir Ken Robinson

quote: A student is not a container you fill, but a torch you light.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The influence of a great teacher can never be erased.
author: Henry Adams

quote: Good teachers make learning look easy; great teachers make you see the magic in it.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Education transforms lives and opens doors of opportunity for everyone.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence.
author: Abigail Adams

quote: The grand result of education is a man in love with his job.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Education is freedom. It's a way to be free.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The teacher who is truly wise gives of his wisdom generously, knowing it multiplies by sharing.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: In education, little things are not little things.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: All human beings want to learn; the school has merely to make learning appealing and accessible.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
author: Gerald Ford

quote: A classroom should be an adventure, not a prison sentence.
author: Sir Ken Robinson

quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
author: Edward Everett

quote: Teachers are the heart of the educational system.
author: Diane Ravitch

quote: Learning happens in the mind and in the heart, not just in the classroom.
author: Diane Ravitch

quote: Learning to read is important, but learning to think is even more important.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Education is the foundation of every society.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The purpose of education is to create minds that can think for themselves.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Teachers make a difference every single day in the lives of our children.
author: Susan Jeffers

quote: If you think education is expensive, try ignorance.
author: Derek Bok

quote: True education flowers when we see the inner strength in every child.
author: Narendra Modi

quote: Education should be the foundation of every person's life.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: When you educate a man you educate a person, but when you educate a woman you educate a family.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The education of women is the weapon for the improvement of the world.
author: Vishwanath Anand

quote: Education is the process by which we cultivate the unique talents of every human being.
author: Sir Ken Robinson

quote: Learning is not a destination; it is a journey.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The teacher's job is to take a child where it is and help it become what it can be.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Children are capable of profound learning and growth when given the right environment and support.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: A good teacher is like a good actor—fully committed to the role.
author: Peter Brook

quote: Teaching is not about getting students to know something, it is about getting them to become something.
author: David Hawkins

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you'll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Henry Thomas Buckle

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

quote: You cannot discover new oceans unless you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.

quote: Your education is a dress rehearsal for a life that is yours to lead.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: Everything you want is on the other side of fear.

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't—you're right.

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.

quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.

quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.

quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment to improve the world.

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

quote: The worst time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second worst time is now.

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.

quote: Courage is not the absence of fear. It is acting despite the fear.

quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.

quote: You need chaos in your soul to give birth to a dancing star.

quote: Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.

quote: The best revenge is massive success.

quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.

quote: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

quote: What we think, we become.

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.

quote: The greatest wealth is health.

quote: Success is not about how much money you make. It's about the difference you make.

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

quote: When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that.

quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
